column14: Kendra escapes into a stairwell that promises sanctuary but when she stumbles out again
column15: she is in the same place - Aldrich Castle - but in a different time: 1815
column16: to be exact.Mistaken for a lady's maid hired to help with weekend guests

column19: how to get back home. However
